message: Operation Underground Railroad (O.U.R.) is a group of former law enforcement and Navy Seals whose sole purpose is to rescue children from the horrors of sex trafficking. While this crime might be more rampant in other nations abroad, it’s also prevalent right here in the United States.

data.description: The Pittsburgh Steelers do a lot to give back to the community, but the most recent cause they’re supporting is tragic on every level.
data.title: Steelers Give Back: The Steelers team up with O.U.R. to help stop child trafficking
